scripts.start: npm run bower&&npm run dll && webpack --config ./webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.start:nomock: npm run bower&&npm run dll && webpack --config ./webpack.dev-nomock.config.js
scripts.server: npm run bower&&npm run dll && webpack-dev-server --config ./webpack.dev.config.js  --inline --open
scripts.server:nomock: npm run bower&&npm run dll && webpack-dev-server --config ./webpack.dev-nomock.config.js  --inline --open
scripts.build: npm run bower&&npm run dll && webpack --config ./webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.debug:start: npm run bower&&npm run dll && node --inspect --inspect-brk node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --config ./webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.debug:build: npm run bower&&npm run dll && node --inspect --inspect-brk node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --config ./webpack.prod.config.js
